There's a graceful swarthiness to this sword. The inscription in the steel reads - 'My eye wanders far from home / To shores of distant Anchorome.'

BG3 Sword of the Emperor Information

Shapeshifter Slayer: This weapon deals an additional 1d4 damage against shapeshifters or polymorphed creatures. Magical Durability: The wielder has a +2 bonus to Saving Throws against spells.
